header.title: Dream Weaver
dreamForm.dreamDetailsPlaceholder: What wonders did you see? What feelings did you experience?
dreamForm.dreamDetailsError: Please describe your dream with at least 10 characters.
dreamForm.culturalContextPlaceholder: Any cultural background or beliefs relevant to your dream?
dreamForm.analyzingToastDescription: Our AI is working its magic.
dreamForm.errorToastDescription: There was an issue analyzing your dream. Please try again.
dreamForm.savingToastDescription: You can find it in your timeline.
dreamForm.speechRecognitionNotSupported: Your browser does not support speech recognition.
dreamForm.speechRecognitionNoSpeech: No speech was detected. Try again.
dreamForm.speechRecognitionAudioCaptureE: Audio capture failed. Check your microphone.
dreamForm.speechRecognitionNotAllowed: Microphone access denied. Please allow access in browser settings.
dreamTimeline.title: My Dream Journal
dreamTimeline.emptyJournalPrompt: Record your first dream to begin your journey of self-discovery!
dreamCard.deleteConfirmationDescription: This action cannot be undone. This dream entry will be permanently deleted from your journal.
homePage.footerText: Â© {year} Dream Weaver. Explore the tapestry of your mind.
